snippet: After returning from a gruesome injury, the Penguins’ Sidney Crosby has scored seven goals with eight assists this postseason, a higher scoring rate than his playoff career average.
abstract: Pittsburgh Penguins center Sidney Crosby, having returned from gruesome injury after being hit in the face by a puck, has scored seven goals and eight assists during postseason, exceeding his playoff career average.

byline.contributor: Dhiren Mahiban contributed reporting from Toronto.

lead_paragraph: After returning from a gruesome injury, the Penguins’ Sidney Crosby has scored seven goals with eight assists this postseason, a higher scoring rate than his playoff career average.

headline.seo: Penguins’ Crosby Playing and Persevering at an Uncommon Level
headline.main: Playing and Persevering at an Uncommon Level
headline.print_headline: Playing and Persevering At an Uncommon Level
